import moment from"moment";export var formatDate=function formatDate(date){var d=new Date(date);return moment(d).format("MMM Do YYYY");};var formatter=new Intl.NumberFormat("en-US",{currency:"USD",minimumFractionDigits:2,maximumFractionDigits:2});export var formatPrice=function formatPrice(amount){var dollars=amount*0.01;return"$".concat(formatter.format(dollars));};export var formatDateLabel=function formatDateLabel(date){var today=new Date();date=new Date(date.replace(' ','T'));var currentTimeFromPosted=Math.abs(today-date);var min=Math.floor(currentTimeFromPosted/1000/60<<0);var sec=Math.floor(currentTimeFromPosted/1000%60);// let minutesSinceOrdered = currentTimeFromPosted.getMinutes();
return min;};
